comments.body: this is fine, but why this change?

Previously, the `Semantics` widgets were creating `SemanticsNode`s with a size of `Rect.zero`. With the new definition of visibility introduced in this PRs, those `SemanticsNode`s are invisible and are no longer allowed in the tree (ensured with asserts). Rather than giving the `Container` in the old code a width and a height, I felt like the code would be easier to read if I instead replace the entire thing with a `Text` widget that has an intrinsic width/height.
